subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Jakub Voracek scored twice in the third period to break open a tight game and lift the Philadelphia Flyers to a 6-4 victory over the host Pittsburgh Penguins.
snippet: Jakub Voracek scored twice in the third period to break open a tight game and lift the Philadelphia Flyers to a 6-4 victory over the host Pittsburgh Penguins.
